sourcesContent:
import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import React from 'react'; import { Button, Container, Nav, Navbar } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../App.css'; // Ensure this file contains your custom styles import esgIcon from '../assets/img/icon_esg.png'; import GreenTrendz from '../assets/img/logo1-2.png'; import logo from '../assets/img/logo.png'; import image from '../assets/img/hero_1.jpg'; const HomePage = () => { // Hero Section Styles const heroStyles = { height: '70vh', backgroundImage: "url('/hero-image.jpg')", // Replace with your hero image backgroundSize: 'cover', backgroundPosition: 'center', color: 'white', }; return (
{/* Header with Navbar */}
Services About Us Contact
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* Carousel Item 1 */}

Empower Your Business for a Sustainable Future

With GreenTrendz, turn your ESG goals into reality through intelligent data management and comprehensive reporting.

    <> {/* Section Title */}

    SERVICES

    Your Partners in Growth and Sustainability

    {/* Modified text */}
    {/* Services Section */}
    {/* Service 1: ESG Reporting */}

    ESG Reporting

    01

    Comprehensive ESG reporting to ensure businesses meet environmental, social, and governance standards for a sustainable future.

    {/* Modified text */}
    • Environmental, Social, Governance compliance
    • Stakeholder engagement and reporting
      • {/* Modified text */}
    • Risk and opportunity management
      • {/* Modified text */}
    {/* Service 2: BRSR - SEBI Framework */}

    BRSR - SEBI Framework

    02

    We help align your sustainability reports with the SEBI BRSR framework, ensuring transparency and accountability in your disclosures.

    {/* Modified text */}
    • Governance, leadership, and accountability
    • Key performance indicators (KPIs)
      • {/* Modified text */}
    • Financial risk disclosures and mitigation strategies
      • {/* Modified text */}
    {/* Service 3: GRI Reporting Framework */}

    GRI Reporting Framework

    03

    We implement the GRI standards to help businesses report their sustainability impacts effectively and transparently.

    {/* Modified text */}
    • Materiality assessment and reporting
    • Disclosure transparency and accountability
    • Performance tracking and reporting
      • {/* Modified text */}
    {/* Service 4: PCAF - Carbon Accounting */}

    PCAF - Carbon Accounting

    04

    We assist businesses in measuring, managing, and reducing their carbon emissions to meet global climate goals using the PCAF methodology.

    {/* Modified text */}
    • Carbon footprint calculation and reporting
      • {/* Modified text */}
    • Emission reduction strategies and practices
    • Alignment with global climate goals and frameworks
      • {/* Modified text */}
    {/* Service 5: Dashboard */}

    Interactive Dashboard

    {/* Modified text */} 05

    Real-time data visualizations and dashboards that track key sustainability metrics and help businesses make informed decisions.

    {/* Modified text */}
    • Real-time sustainability data analysis
    • Customizable KPIs, graphs, and charts
    • Cloud-based reporting and access
    {/* About Us Section */}
    {/* Shape behind the image */}
    {/* This will hold the circular background */} {/* Main Image */}

    More than Dashboard for Enhanced Insights

    Transform the way your organization tracks and enhances performance with our innovative Dashboard! Dive deep into data analysis and visualization, turning numbers into compelling stories that drive informed decision-making and inspire growth.

    {/* Small Image */}

    • Data Upload: Easily upload annual Excel data for seamless integration.

    {/* Small Image */}

    • Insight Extraction: Analyze key Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) metrics.

    {/* Small Image */}

    • Custom Visuals: Generate tailored diagrams and dashboards for effective data visualization.

    • ESG Focus: Create specialized dashboards centered on ESG parameters for actionable sustainability tracking.

    {/* ESG Section */}
    {/* Section Title */}

    What is ESG?

    Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) criteria are a set of standards for a company’s operations that socially conscious investors use to screen potential investments.

    Understanding ESG can help investors assess the sustainability and societal impact of their investments.

    Environmental

    1. Climate & Energy
    2. GHG Emissions
    3. Water
    4. Materials & Waste
    5. Biodiversity
    6. Air Emissions

    Social

    1. Health & Safety
    2. Diversity, Equity & Inclusion
    3. Communities
    4. Labor
    5. Product Marketing & Labeling

    Governance

    1. Corporate Governance
    2. Risk Management
    3. Supplier Performance
    4. Board Diversity
    5. Ethics & Code of Conduct
    6. Anti-Corruption Practices
    {/* Introductory Section */}

    Sustainability at the Core: Discover How Our Services Drive Progress.

    Your ESG Partner for a Brighter Tomorrow

    {/* Top Footer Section */}
    {/* Useful Links Section */}

    Useful Links

    • Home
    • About Us
    • Services
    • Terms of Service
    • Privacy Policy
    {/* Resources Section */}

    Resources
